org.agreement_technologies.common.map_landmarks

Interface LandmarkFluent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LMLiteral

    public interface LandmarkFluent
    LandmarkFluent interface provides the necessary methods to work with fluents, i.e. (variable, value), in the landmarks graph.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAgents()
      Gets agents that are aware of the landmark fluent.
      int getIndex()
      Gets index of the landmark fluent.
      int getLevel()
      Gets level of the landmark fluent in the RPG.
      java.util.ArrayList<LandmarkAction> getProducers()
      Gets producer actions that come before the fluent in the RPG.
      java.util.ArrayList<LandmarkAction> getTotalProducers()
      Gets producer actions of the fluent, even if they come after the fluent in the RPG.
      java.lang.String getValue()
      Gets value assigned to the variable of the landmark fluent.
      GroundedVar getVar()
      Gets the variable associated to the landmark fluent.
      java.lang.String getVarName()
      Gets the name of the variable associated to the landmark fluent.
      boolean isGoal()
      Verifies if the landmark fluent is a task goal.
